title: Rebuilding confidence post-burnout
context: Composite of managers re-entering after burnout-related leave while negotiating reduced hours and energy rebuild.
session_flow: Ran an energy audit to map activities that drain or restore focus.
Scripted requests for accommodations and experimented with gradual responsibility increases.
Set up a weekly reflection ritual to notice progress before urgency took over.
boundary_and_consent: Established a scale for checking capacity before deeper somatic exercises.
Agreed to skip any task that recreated burnout warning signs.
timeframe: 6 sessions over 9 weeks with lightweight check-ins between meetings.
shift: They described steadier energy and could articulate needs with less guilt.
outcome: Negotiated a phased return plan and identified early warning signals before accepting new commitments.
